org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.backpressure

类 BackPressureStatsTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.rest.handler.legacy.backpressure.BackPressureStatsTracker

  • public class BackPressureStatsTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    Back pressure statistics tracker.

    Back pressure is determined by sampling running tasks. If a task is slowed down by back pressure it will be stuck in memory requests to a LocalBufferPool.

    The back pressured stack traces look like this: 

     java.lang.Object.wait(Native Method)
 o.a.f.[...].LocalBufferPool.requestBuffer(LocalBufferPool.java:163)
 o.a.f.[...].LocalBufferPool.requestBufferBlocking(LocalBufferPool.java:133) <--- BLOCKING
 request
 [...]

      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Callback on completed stack trace sample.

        private final java.lang.Object lock
        Lock guarding trigger operations.

      • coordinator

        private final StackTraceSampleCoordinator coordinator

      • operatorStatsCache

        private final org.apache.flink.shaded.guava18.com.google.common.cache.Cache<ExecutionJobVertex,OperatorBackPressureStats> operatorStatsCache
        Completed stats. Important: Job vertex IDs need to be scoped by job ID, because they are potentially constant across runs messing up the cached data.

      • pendingStats

        private final java.util.Set<ExecutionJobVertex> pendingStats
        Pending in progress stats. Important: Job vertex IDs need to be scoped by job ID, because they are potentially constant across runs messing up the cached data.

      • cleanUpInterval

        private final int cleanUpInterval
        Cleanup interval for completed stats cache.

        Flag indicating whether the stats tracker has been shut down.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BackPressureStatsTracker

        public BackPressureStatsTracker(StackTraceSampleCoordinator coordinator,
                                int cleanUpInterval,
                                int numSamples,
                                Time delayBetweenSamples)
        Creates a back pressure statistics tracker.
        参数:
        cleanUpInterval - Clean up interval for completed stats.
        numSamples - Number of stack trace samples when determining back pressure.
        delayBetweenSamples - Delay between samples when determining back pressure.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCleanUpInterval

        public long getCleanUpInterval()
        Cleanup interval for completed stats cache.

      • getOperatorBackPressureStats

        public java.util.Optional<OperatorBackPressureStats> getOperatorBackPressureStats(ExecutionJobVertex vertex)
        Returns back pressure statistics for a operator.
        参数:
        vertex - Operator to get the stats for.
        返回:
        Back pressure statistics for an operator

      • triggerStackTraceSample

        public boolean triggerStackTraceSample(ExecutionJobVertex vertex)
        Triggers a stack trace sample for a operator to gather the back pressure statistics. If there is a sample in progress for the operator, the call is ignored.
        参数:
        vertex - Operator to get the stats for.
        返回:
        Flag indicating whether a sample with triggered.

      • cleanUpOperatorStatsCache

        public void cleanUpOperatorStatsCache()
        Cleans up the operator stats cache if it contains timed out entries.

        The Guava cache only evicts as maintenance during normal operations. If this handler is inactive, it will never be cleaned.

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Shuts down the stats tracker.

        Invalidates the cache and clears all pending stats.

      • invalidateOperatorStatsCache

        void invalidateOperatorStatsCache()
        Invalidates the cache (irrespective of clean up interval).
